RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.J. Scott Hacker: Does not consider the fact that the black Dodge pickup truck was riding low as contributing to reasonable suspicion for a stop.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.black Dodge pickup truck: Vehicle involved in the smuggling operation, driven by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., and exhibited suspicious behavior such as riding low.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.white Malibu sedan: Vehicle involved in the smuggling operation, had five passengers and was presumed to be riding low due to the number of people inside.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge: Agent who approached the white Malibu sedan and presumed it was riding low because there were five people in it.
